original_title: 22才の別れ Lycoris 葉見ず花見ず物語
overview: It is the second work of the Oita trilogy of Obayashi . Following " Nigori Snow ", Ise Masazo draws a song written by composers and songwriter "Farewell of 22 years old " as a motif and draws a story of love that spans two generations of mother and daughter.
title: Song of Goodbye
